decks.notes: This deck focuses on tutoring creatures onto the battlefield using Green Sun's Zenith and Karn, the Great Creator, while generating mana with Devoted Druid and Leyline of Abundance. The deck aims to create a powerful board presence by utilizing a variety of creatures with different abilities, such as Badgermole Cub for removal, Spider Manifestation for token generation, and Ouroboroid for recursion. With Craterhoof Behemoth as a finisher, this deck is able to quickly overwhelm opponents with a combination of creature toolbox options and powerful combo potential.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on fast, aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. Cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls allow for early pressure, while cards like Ranger-Captain of Eos and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provide powerful mid-game threats. The deck also includes removal options like Thraben Charm and Goblin Bombardment to deal with opposing creatures. The key strategy is to maintain a relentless assault on the opponent, utilizing a mix of creatures and burn spells to secure victory.

The main concept of this Dimir Control deck is to disrupt and control the opponent's game plan through a combination of counterspells and removal spells like Fatal Push. The deck also includes cards like Psychic Frog and Quantum Riddler to provide card advantage and stall the game. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Orcish Bowmasters and legendary creatures like Kaito, Bane of Nightmares, and Wan Shi Tong, Librarian, adds an additional win condition to the deck. Overall, the strategy focuses on outlasting the opponent while slowly grinding them down to secure a victory.

Utilizing the UrzaTron lands to quickly ramp up mana, this control deck focuses on dropping powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger, as well as planeswalkers like Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms. With disruption spells like Kozilek's Command and Dismember, along with card advantage from Mind Stone and Vexing Bauble, the deck aims to control the game by denying resources and overwhelming opponents with massive threats. Relic of Progenitus also helps in graveyard interaction, making it a versatile tool in disrupting combo and graveyard-reliant decks.

The deck focuses on controlling the game with a combination of powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria and Teferi, Time Raveler, along with versatile removal spells like Wrath of the Skies and Solitude. It also includes disruptive spells such as Orim's Chant and No More Lies to disrupt opponents' game plans. The deck aims to stall the game, generate card advantage, and eventually win with powerful threats like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Omnath, Locus of Creation. The inclusion of cards like Isochron Scepter and Prismatic Ending provides additional utility and flexibility in different matchups.

This deck aims to control the game by ramping up mana quickly using cards like Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple, while also using disruptive spells like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble to hinder the opponent's strategy. The deck utilizes powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker to finish off the opponent and seal the game. It also includes different forms of removal and creatures with strong abilities to maintain board control and dominate the late game. This deck is designed to overwhelm opponents with powerful threats while keeping them in check with various control elements.

This deck focuses on quickly assembling the combo of Puresteel Paladin, Colossus Hammer, and Sigarda's Aid to create a massive threat. Stoneforge Mystic is used to search for equipment like Colossus Hammer, while Urza's Saga provides additional tutoring. Inkmoth Nexus provides an alternative win condition with poison counters. The deck also includes equipment enablers like Springleaf Drum and Mox Opal, as well as disruption in the form of Esper Sentinel and Lightning Bolt. The goal is to efficiently equip a creature with Colossus Hammer and swing for lethal damage in the early turns of the game.

The deck focuses on assembling a variety of low-cost creatures with powerful abilities that can be used to combo off and generate value. It utilizes tools like Green Sun's Zenith to tutor for key pieces, Yawgmoth, Thran Physician to draw cards and remove creatures, and Agatha's Soul Cauldron to recur creatures from the graveyard. The deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a toolbox of creatures that can disrupt their game plan while building towards a game-winning combo.

The deck focuses on quickly milling opponents' library through cards like Hedron Crab, Ruin Crab, and Archive Trap. It aims to disrupt opponent's strategy with cards like Fatal Push, Surgical Extraction, and Tasha's Hideous Laughter. Additionally, it has control elements like Drown in the Loch and Echoing Truth to handle threats. The deck also includes card draw with Visions of Beyond and Fractured Sanity to maintain hand advantage. Overall, the key concept is to consistently mill opponent's library while controlling the board and disrupting their strategy.

The main focus of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using cheap and efficient creatures and spells. With a low mana curve and a mix of burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, along with aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early on and finish the game quickly. Cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration help with card selection and maintaining a consistent flow of threats, while cards like Violent Urge and Mutagenic Growth provide additional damage and combat tricks.

This deck aims to control the game through ramping up mana with Utopia Sprawl and Eldrazi Temple to bring out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul, the Promised End and Sire of Seven Deaths. Using cards like Malevolent Rumble and Kozilek's Command, the deck disrupts the opponent's strategies while steadily building up its own board presence. The deck also includes cards like Formidable Speaker and Soulless Jailer to maintain control over the battlefield. Overall, the deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures and controlling the game tempo.

The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to control the board while also taxing the opponent's resources. It includes a mix of removal spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize, along with creatures like Overlord of the Balemurk and Flickerwisp to apply pressure. The deck also utilizes cards like Emptiness and Marsh Flats to disrupt the opponent's game plan and gain incremental advantages. Additionally, it features cards like Phelia, Exuberant Shepherd and Solitude for additional protection and disruption. Ultimately, the deck aims to quickly overwhelm opponents while disrupting their strategy.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly flood the board with cheap artifacts and creatures to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Urza's Saga provide additional value and recurring threats, while cards like Springleaf Drum and Mishra's Bauble help with mana acceleration and card draw. The deck also includes disruption with Portable Hole and Tormod's Crypt to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to quickly close out the game with a mix of efficient threats and disruptive elements.

The deck focuses on utilizing Amulet of Vigor to ramp up mana quickly and efficiently in order to cast Primeval Titan and search for key lands such as Urza's Saga and Lotus Field. By generating large amounts of mana, the deck can then combo off with cards like Scapeshift to find win conditions and overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Green Sun's Zenith and Summoner's Pact provide additional consistency and flexibility to the deck's game plan, allowing for different pathways to victory.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Emrakul, the Promised End and World Breaker. It also utilizes control elements like Ugin, the Eye of Storms and Malevolent Rumble to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck includes cards that can generate additional mana, destroy opponent's lands, and punish aggressive strategies. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with massive threats while controlling the game through disruption and removal spells.

The deck focuses on utilizing Leylines and powerful creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By combining Leyline of the Guildpact with Leyline Binding, the deck aims to control the board while deploying threats like Scion of Draco, Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer. Stubborn Denial provides protection for your creatures, while spells like Lightning Bolt and Teferi, Time Raveler offer additional control and disruption. With a strong mana base and versatile cards like Arena of Glory, the deck aims to maintain pressure and tempo throughout the game.
